All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bishop
Governs the state of the bishop.
Board
This class handles the pieces on the board as well as manage valid moves including identification of check and checkmate.
Chess
Application class which takes in user input for moves and processes them.

Governs the state of the king.

Governs the state of the knight.

Governs the state of the pawn.
Piece
Common functionality for all the pieces.
